subject: Coaches and Managers
Football (College)
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: Winning has never been a problem for Bobby Petrino, but the Arkansas coach’s disclosure of a relationship with a young employee after a motorcycle crash has put new focus on his character.
snippet: Winning has never been a problem for Bobby Petrino, but the Arkansas coach’s disclosure of a relationship with a young employee after a motorcycle crash has put new focus on his character.
